NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.FLIGHT_COMPLETED_DESC: Scheduled flight for Drone #2 completed successfully

FOOTER.CREATED_BY: Created by Adrián Jiménez Santiago as an educational activity.

DRONE_MATRIX.TITLE: Drone Matrix Visualization
DRONE_MATRIX.SUBTITLE: Interactive grid for monitoring drone positions and movements

FLIGHT_CONTROL.TITLE: Flight Control Center
FLIGHT_CONTROL.SUBTITLE: Control and monitor drone movements in real-time
FLIGHT_CONTROL.VALID_COMMANDS: Commands are valid and will move the drone within matrix boundaries.
FLIGHT_CONTROL.GROUP_COMMANDS_HINT: These commands will be executed by all selected drones
FLIGHT_CONTROL.VALID_GROUP_COMMANDS: Commands are valid for all selected drones.
FLIGHT_CONTROL.INVALID_GROUP_COMMANDS: Some drones will encounter issues with these commands.
FLIGHT_CONTROL.BATCH_COLLISIONS: Potential collisions detected in batch execution:
FLIGHT_CONTROL.PAN: Pan: Click and drag the matrix or use arrow keys
FLIGHT_CONTROL.ZOOM: Zoom: Use mouse wheel or pinch gesture (touch)
FLIGHT_CONTROL.SELECT_DRONE_HELP: Select Drone: Click on a drone to select it
FLIGHT_CONTROL.VIEW_ALL_DRONES: View All Drones: Click the "Fit All Drones" button to show all drones

SETTINGS.TITLE: System Settings
SETTINGS.SUBTITLE: Configure your drone control system preferences

GENERAL.TITLE: General
GENERAL.DARK_MODE_DESC: Enable dark theme for the application
GENERAL.ITEMS_PER_PAGE_DESC: Number of items to display per page in lists
GENERAL.DATE_FORMAT_DESC: Format for displaying dates throughout the application

DRONE.TITLE: Drone Control
DRONE.AUTO_POSITION_DESC: Automatically position new drones at matrix origin
DRONE.CONFIRM_COMMANDS_DESC: Show confirmation dialog before executing flight commands
DRONE.COMMAND_DELAY_DESC: Delay between command executions for visualization
DRONE.BOUNDARY_CHECK_DESC: Prevent drones from moving outside matrix boundaries
DRONE.COLLISION_DETECTION_DESC: Prevent drones from occupying the same position

API.TITLE: API Configuration
API.API_URL_DESC: Base URL for the drone control API
API.REQUEST_TIMEOUT_DESC: Maximum time to wait for API responses
API.RETRY_ATTEMPTS_DESC: Number of times to retry failed API requests

ACTIONS.RESET_SUCCESS_DETAIL: {{section}} settings have been reset to defaults.
